steps: step 3: Click on link ' Place an order' -> Navigate to page 'cart'
step 5: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout ' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
step 7: Enter input value in input field 'email'
step 8: Click on input field 'receive marketing info'
step 9: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO SHIPPING'
step 10: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
